stripped_text: You can install unique () companion resources and unique () connection resources onto this resource. Each resource installed this way costs 1 credit less to install. While this resource has a hosted companion and a hosted connection, you get +2 maximum hand size.
text: You can install unique ({unique}) companion resources and unique ({unique}) connection resources onto this resource. Each resource installed this way costs 1[credit] less to install. While this resource has a hosted companion and a hosted connection, you get +2 maximum hand size.
title: Hackerspace
